mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contacts AS "contacts", a.address AS "address", a.phone AS "phone", a.fax AS "fax", a.mail AS "mail", a.weixin AS "weixin", a.qq AS "qq", a.msn AS "msn", a.facebook AS "facebook", a.skype AS "skype", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_contact( id, contacts, address, phone, fax, mail, weixin, qq, msn, facebook, skype, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contacts}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{mail}, #{weixin}, #{qq}, #{msn}, #{facebook}, #{skype}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_contact SET contacts = #{contacts}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, mail = #{mail}, weixin = #{weixin}, qq = #{qq}, msn = #{msn}, facebook = #{facebook}, skype = #{skype}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
